lead_paragraph: WALSH--Joseph M.,72, of Orangeburg, NY, formerly of Woodcliff Lake, NJ and CEO and Chairman of Curtis Circulation Company and owner of The Stadium Sports Memorabilia Bar and Restaurant, passed away Friday, January 15, 2016 at 4:18pm after his heroic battle with pancreatic cancer. Walsh is survived by his wife, Theresa Walsh (nee Vericker), their five children, Joseph, Jr., Matthew (Laura), Teresa Ann (Steven), John (Emilie) and James (Christina); and their fifteen grandchildren, Ryan, Michael, Kate, Colin, Sean, Erin, Aidan, John Patrick, Nicole, Kellie Rose, Christopher, Nicholas, Joseph, Juliana and Gabriella. A wake will be held for Walsh from 7 to 9pm on Monday, January 18, 2016 and from 2 to 4pm and 7 to 9pm on Tuesday, January 19, 2016 at the Moritz Funeral Home, 98 Route 303 South, Tappan, NY 10983. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at 10:00am on Wednesday, January 20, 2016 at St. Anthony's Church, 36 West Nyack Road, Nanuet, NY 10954. Memorial contributions may be made to Project Children, a registered 501(c)(3) Non-profit organization at PO Box 933, Greenwood Lake, NY 10925. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WALSH, JOSEPH M.
